ai_generation_prompt.main_prompt: Create a modern, minimalist app icon for 'FaceLoom', a face analysis and exercise guidance mobile application. The icon should combine facial symmetry/analysis with weaving/loom patterns. CRITICAL: Use ONLY Deep Indigo color (#6366F1, RGB: 99,102,241) - this is a MONOCHROMATIC design. Create depth and dimension using different opacity levels (100%, 80%, 60%, 40%) and lighter/darker shades of the same indigo color. Geometric style with clean, sharp lines. Perfectly symmetrical design. Professional and eye-catching. Transparent background. Must work at both small (60x60px) and large (1024x1024px) sizes. Style: ultra-minimalist, modern tech, scientific, premium quality, single-color sophistication.
ai_generation_prompt.detailed_prompt:
Design a square app icon (1024x1024px) for FaceLoom mobile app with these specifications:

CONCEPT: Merge facial analysis technology with weaving/loom pattern symbolism

VISUAL ELEMENTS:
- Central focus: Stylized geometric face outline or face mesh (abstract, not realistic)
- Background pattern: Subtle weaving/loom grid or interlaced lines
- Symmetry: Perfect bilateral symmetry to represent facial analysis
- Layering: Use opacity variations to create depth without additional colors

ğŸ¨ COLOR SCHEME (MONOCHROMATIC - CRITICAL):
- ONLY ONE COLOR: Deep Indigo #6366F1 (RGB: 99, 102, 241 | HSL: 243Â° 75% 59%)
- NO other colors allowed (no teal, green, gold, yellow, or any other hue)
- Create depth using:
  * Different opacity levels: 100% (solid), 80%, 60%, 40%, 20%
  * Lighter shades: #8B8DF5, #B3B5F9, #DBDCFD
  * Darker shades: #4F52C9, #3B3EA1
- Monochromatic aesthetic for ultra-minimalist, sophisticated look

STYLE REQUIREMENTS:
- Modern, minimalist, geometric
- Clean, sharp edges
- Professional and trustworthy appearance
- Premium quality feel
- Tech-forward aesthetic
- Single-color sophistication

TECHNICAL:
- Format: PNG with transparent background
- Size: 1024x1024 pixels
- Must be recognizable at 60x60px (test scalability)
- No text or letters
- No realistic human features
- Avoid clichÃ© AI symbols (brain, robot)
- Ensure icon works on both light and dark backgrounds

MOOD: Scientific, innovative, trustworthy, minimalist, premium, focused

INSPIRATION: Face mesh technology, textile weaving patterns, sacred geometry, modern tech branding, Apple's minimalist design language
ai_generation_prompt.alternative_short_prompt: Monochromatic app icon: geometric face mesh + weaving pattern, ONLY deep indigo #6366F1 with opacity variations (100%, 80%, 60%, 40%), symmetrical, minimalist, clean lines, professional tech aesthetic, 1024x1024px PNG transparent, no text, single color design
